comment.author: 26672548@N00
comment._content: Interesting, but like many old stereoscopic photos, it is not really stereoscopic; just two of the same image.

comment.author: 52447809@N00
comment._content: I think it may be hard to see because so much of the scene is in the same plane, but the ever-so-slight difference is most visible on the left edge of the suitcase. (see note boxes) -- Seen in your Freeze Frame set. (?)

comment.author: 26672548@N00
comment._content: You're right.  I stand corrected.  It is a very small stereo base, but it is indeed two seperate shots.

comment._content: this is my great, great grandfather!

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/13445560@N02] You can be proud! He was one of the greatest!
